Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Magdeburg, InterCityHotel Magdeburg is minutes from Green Citadel of Magdeburg and Magdeburg Parliament. This hotel is within close proximity of Monatery of Our Lady and Cathedral of Magdeburg.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 175 guestrooms featuring minibars. Satellite programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Magdeburg. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Magdeburg? This hotel has 2475 square feet (230 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of InterCityHotel Magdeburg. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Centrally located in Magdeburg, InterCityHotel Magdeburg is minutes from Green Citadel of Magdeburg and Magdeburg Parliament. This hotel is within close proximity of Monatery of Our Lady and Cathedral of Magdeburg.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Green Citadel of Magdeburg - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Magdeburg Parliament - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Monatery of Our Lady - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Cathedral of Magdeburg - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Elbauenpark - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Millennium Tower - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Magdeburg Zoo - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Colbitz Wind Mill - 20 km / 12.5 mi
Colbitz Museum - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi
St. Paul's Church - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi
Motorsport Arena Oschersleben - 26.5 km / 16.5 mi

The preferred airport for InterCityHotel Magdeburg is Hannover (HAJ) - 136.4 km / 84.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for InterCityHotel Magdeburg is Hannover (HAJ-Hannover Airport) - 136.4 km / 84.8 mi.
